subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Apparel
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Polo Ralph Lauren will become the first external company in 129 years to outfit Wimbledon's on-court officials, who will exchange their green polyester grass-blending jackets for smart navy blue ones.
snippet: Polo Ralph Lauren will become the first external company in 129 years to outfit Wimbledon's on-court officials, who will exchange their green polyester grass-blending jackets for smart navy blue ones.
